R Reference Manual Logan McLaurin 2024-07-15 Chapter 1 R Basics 1.1 Introduction 1.1.1 Operators R Operators Math Functions 1.1.2 Variables vector: a collection of values, created by using R’s “combine” function c() numeric: Numbers including floating point and integer values integer: integer variables, whole number values having no fractional part Often suffixed with L, var <- 10L complex: complex numbers var <- 9 + 3i character: variables made up of strings (not a datatype itself) any quotes are fine logical
